> @rultor release, tag is `0.37`

@amihaiemil OK, I will release it now. Please check the progress [here](http://www.rultor.com/t/14245-378535504)

> @rultor release, tag is `0.37`

Job [#1373](https://github.com/jcabi/jcabi-github/issues/1373) is now in scope, role is `DEV`

<!-- https://www.0crat.com/footprint/C9R53K5JA/950825899, version: 1.0-SNAPSHOT, hash: 897008f6 -->
That test has to be fixed and only check for ``startsWith("jcabi-github ")``, since the version will always be different, at least at release time.

The job [#1373](https://github.com/jcabi/jcabi-github/issues/1373) assigned to @amihaiemil[/z](https://www.0crat.com/u/amihaiemil), here is [why](https://www.0crat.com/footprint/C9R53K5JA/950825901); the budget is 30 minutes, see [ยง4](http://www.zerocracy.com/policy.html#4); please, read [ยง8](http://www.zerocracy.com/policy.html#8) and [ยง9](http://www.zerocracy.com/policy.html#9); if the task is not clear, read [this](http://www.yegor256.com/2015/02/16/it-is-not-a-school.html) and [this](http://www.yegor256.com/2015/01/15/how-to-cut-corners.html)
